The tides of destiny sometimes lead to the most unexpected results. You would have risen as a god, but, driven by an impossible pride and arrogance, you achieved ultimate power despite the shackles of your broken, decaying body. Summoning the endless powers you now possess, you turn your back to your initial plans, and set out to bind the world to your will.\\n\\n[[col:red]]Congratulations: you have unlocked an easter egg, enjoy your campaign as the Great Necromancer[[/col]]

As the warboss lays broken at your feet, you cannot help but marvel at this unlikely combination of Dhar and what the greenkins call Waaagh magic that Azhag wielded, and the potential it offered. Without even thinking, you raise a hand and start gathering your necromantic powers...
Serving the Supreme Lord of Undeath is an honour beyond measure. A new Mortarch has joined the invicible Legions of Nagashizzar.
To resist the call of Nagash is to call the wrath of Death itself. The wrath of Nagashizzar will be terrible.

The ritual complete, necromantic energies swept the world, changing it forever. The Dark Gods were laughing no more, for a new god now ruled the lands. As Nagash ascended, so the dead rose across the world. Those unfortunate to survive the initial soul-reaping wave of dark magic were now at the mercy of the unliving multitude.\\nChaos was defeated, for a world of death would provide them souls no more. Nagash ruled supreme, and those left to witness his ruleship left with only two alternatives: serve him in life, or in undeath.

Having long-sought the means to regain his former spellcasting abilities, Luthor’s desire to repair his damaged mind has finally been realised. For years, the mental instabilities caused by his multiple personalities have prevented him from wielding the Winds of Magic, but no more – the Lore of the Deep eludes him no longer!\\n\\nAll shall fear the Pirate King more than they ever have before!

Neferata's vampiric powers proved too tempting for {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} to resist. Enslaved to the will of the undead lady, they now serve as vassals to the Lahmian.
This faction has let the seductive Vampires lure them to the very brink of damnation. You may send your vampires to attempt to dominate them and force them into vassalage.
Our faithful vassal fulfilled their oath and has sent promised levy to us.

In a twist of fate, Neferata's vampiric seduction captivated the living enemies. Their hearts swayed by her unholy charisma, they willingly abandoned their cause, pledging their loyalty to the Queen of Lahmia, forever bound by her enchanting grasp.

Geneviève Dieudonné, the immortal vampire of legendary repute, sought solace among a faction in need. With her arrival, a ripple of intrigue spread, as the faction's warriors found themselves invigorated by her wisdom and otherworldly presence.

Amidst bittersweet farewells, Geneviève Dieudonné bid her faction adieu. Yet, she left behind a parting gift that would forever be cherished. With gratitude for her service, Geneviève bestowed upon the nation a generous sum of wealth earned during her tenure, ensuring their prosperity and continued resilience in the face of future trials.

Within your lands, one rule holds true: trespassers deserve no mercy! The Hex of the [[col:yellow]]Coven's Cursemark[[/col]] has already found its target, sapping them of energy until every movement is a struggle. They will not run far, should you decide to hunt them down…

A dark curse has befallen your army, afflicting your soldiers with a paralyzing lethargy. Trespassing in foreign lands is never without risk, but none could have anticipated the threat of such a dark and twisted Hex!

There one moment and gone the next, a whole army has disappeared into the ether, swept up in the [[col:yellow]]Jinxed Land[[/col]] Hex and deposited into the dark. The Magical Forest shall be there to greet them, once their eyes have adjusted to the gloom.

A sudden wave of magic has swept over your army, whisking them into a dark and forbidding forest, where curious eyes seem to peer out from every shadow. Such a Hex could only be the work of a powerful soul indeed…

An army of darkness descends on your enemies! With their settlement under constant assault by the bloodthirsty spirits summoned by your [[col:yellow]]Recreant Spirit[[/col]] Hex, it is only a matter of time before they crumble.

Dark spirits haunt your every step, eager to have you join their ranks and drag you into death beside them. Driven by some kind of wicked curse, they march ceaselessly on your settlement, hungering for blood. One can only hope this Dark Magic will soon wane!

The weak are so easily broken! Like puppets, your enemies fall to the [[col:yellow]]Bewitching Lure[[/col]], dancing to whatever tune you command of them. With your new thralls siphoning gold from their own settlements, your riches will soon know no bounds!

A treacherous Spirit has beguiled your people, bewitching those of weak mind to her will. As gold leeches from your coffers at an alarming rate, it would seem that her newfound thralls are quietly offering her your income!
The words of the [[col:yellow]]Tainted Chant[[/col]] echo across the land, corrupting everyting in the soil. Wickedness taint the earth here.

Trespassing upon a Undead's land is a dangerous game. When the Kalledria wail in unison, they sear onto the flesh of interlopers a sinister mark that turns the very magic of the world against them. The Coven's Cursemark ensures one thing for its target: despair.

The world’s Magical Forests call to the Kalledria, revealing gateways long since hidden. No matter the distance or what lies between, the Coven can traverse their secret ingresses in the blink of an eye.

Those foolish enough to strike a deal with a Spirit find that death is merely the beginning of an unending serfdom. The power to call upon these restless spirits has been found; a Hex to haunt unknowing foes now in the Coven’s hands.
Fickle minds are always susceptible to the whims of an alluring charm from a befouling Spirit. A Bewitching Lure will exploit those weak of will.
There are places where the Coven’s magic seeps from the land, befouled by the blight of corruption.

The five forbidden Hexes have been assembled, each piece a scattered fragment of a grand and sinister whole. Together they reveal a most baleful Hex, capable of bringing calamity to an entire race. They call it the "Malediction of Ruin".
